title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“ 'Easy writing,' said Sheridan, 'is sometimes d——d hard reading.' ” —Thomas Carlyle (in Memoirs of the Life of Sir Walter Scott, London and Westminster Review, 1837).
